info.name: Cardiac Risk Predictor - Postman Tests
info.description: This collection has a mix of HTTP requests in order to test the app Cardiac Risk Predictor

item.name: Reach limit of requests for a Fremium Account

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("The user has reached the max number of requests allowed per minute");

item.description:
This collection executes 6 requests using a freemium account in order to reach the limit for freemium accounts, which is 5 request per minute. The last request validates the body response, expecting the string "The user has reached the max number of requests allowed per minute".
The freemium account used is: Key = 741f24cf76d772b15dcdd896d6044812

item.name: Reach limit of requests for a Premium Account

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("The user has reached the max number of requests allowed per minute");

item.description:
This collection executes 51 requests using a premium account in order to reach the limit for premium accounts, which is 50 request per minute. The last request validates the body response, expecting the string "The user has reached the max number of requests allowed per minute".
The premium account used is: Key = 7803f9b4f94ab605f48087da2c2a1627

item.name: Test missing parameters

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Authorization header with API key is missing");

item.description:
This collection checks that the validations for missing parameters are working properly.
The premium account used in this collection is: Key: 61ca6ffc6b94545a58a75ce0637ebf36

item.name: Test not authorized account
item.description:
This collection checks whether the validation for invalid accounts is working properly.
The invalid account used in this collection is: Key: f0541dc5c60aedbf38d31c38eb07d5e7 (not registered account)

item.name: Test out of range parameters
item.description:
This collection checks whether the out of range validations are working properly.
The premium account used in this collection is: Key: 61ca6ffc6b94545a58a75ce0637ebf36

item.name: Test services individually

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("The request has been stored in the database successfully");

item.description:
This collection sends requests to each service whitout calling the gateway in order to test whether they can run individually.
The premium account used in this collection is: Key: 61ca6ffc6b94545a58a75ce0637ebf36
